Student Directory Staff Directory University of Essex homepage Jon Chamberlain People Dr Jon Chamberlain Senior Lecturer School of Computer Science and Electronic Engineering (CSEE) Email jchamb@essex.ac.uk Telephone +44 (0) 1206 872366 Location 5A.538, Colchester Campus Academic support hours Academic support is available by pre-arranged Zoom meeting or face-to-face meeting. My support hours are 11am-1pm on Friday but please contact me by email to confirm you will attend or to arrange a meeting at a more convenient time.
